infos.value: ...Phew! We've made it to Leonis Castle.
With all due joy, we've passed our enlistment test!
Ahh, now I can behold the admirable Lord Sterne's face...
What's the matter, Yerma?
Aren't you happy?
No, I'm more concerned with whether or not we'll actually be allowed to join «Fortem»...
Ah, I get what you mean!
That Lilyth or whatever doesn't seem like a very nice person, huh...
Though we eradicated the skeletons, to think that we could still be ineligible...
Huh!? That would be work with no pay! What an exploitative kingdom!
...So, what do we do?
We'll just have to achieve something great enough to take even that Lilyth woman by surprise.
...Like what?
Ah, I've got it!
That Lilyth person said it earlier.
Fennes's soldiers have started poking their noses around at the border. She said she's quite pressed dealing with them.
Whose noses?
...I suppose it is understandable that a person like you with no sense of direction wouldn't know about them.
It seems that Fennes is the country neighboring Leonis to the northeast.
So we just have to give those Fennes troops a thorough beating until they're wiped out...
Then Lord Sterne would surely spare us his attention, no matter how much Lilyth objects.
Huh!? You mean...one of us could be a prospect for his bride!?
I think you're jumping to conclusions.
But...it's not totally impossible.
Wow, wow! What should I do, what should I do!?
Well...should we go?
Let's go!
Of course!
